attributes.action: Have a two tier system for interest rates, higher interest rates for savers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like high interest rates for savers because i am fed up of having to subsidize the want everything now society .Dont forget Mr Brown savers outnumber lenders by seven to one and we have had enough . What will happen when everyone takes their money out, the banks will collapse ,and if you want every one to spend you have got another  thing coming we will put our money abroad instead.
